sentences.en: Clever advertising would seduce more people into smoking.
sentences.cn: 巧妙策划的广告会引诱更多的人吸烟。

sentences.en: Clever tailoring can flatter your figure.
sentences.cn: 巧妙的裁剪可以使你的身材显得优美。

sentences.en: Even clever people are not terribly clever when put on the spot.
sentences.cn: 即便是聪明人在面对难题时也未必就能表现得特别聪明。

sentences.en: He may be clever, but he doesn't know everything.
sentences.cn: 他或许聪明, 但是他不可能知道所有的事情.

sentences.en: He was clever, well-read and interested in the arts.
sentences.cn: 他很聪明，博览群书，并且对艺术很感兴趣。

sentences.en: How clever of you to work it out!
sentences.cn: 你解决了这个问题真是太聪明了！

sentences.en: It was both deliberate and malicious, not to mention clever.
sentences.cn: 这件事是处心积虑、早有预谋的，更不用说其手段的高明。

sentences.en: Northbridge is a cool, calculating and clever criminal who could strike again.
sentences.cn: 诺思布里奇是个头脑冷静、诡计多端、阴险狡诈的罪犯，他可能还会犯案。

sentences.en: Poor old Henry, and not half as clever as he'd thought.
sentences.cn: 可怜的老亨利，以为自己多聪明。

sentences.en: Rowe does a very clever riff on the nature of prejudice.
sentences.cn: 罗就偏见的本质讲了一番很精辟的话。

sentences.en: She is very clever at getting men to do her bidding!
sentences.cn: 她很善于让男人听她的吩咐！

sentences.en: You really are quite a clever little thing.
sentences.cn: 你真是个聪明的小家伙。

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)未免太聪明了，卖弄小聪明

trans.tran_en: able to learn and understand things quickly
